last_episode_to_air.name: Feline Phantom in Minnesota and More
last_episode_to_air.overview: A baby monitor picks up a ghostly figure walking next to a child's bed. A speeding UFO infiltrates an air show. A young woman ushers in the new year with an undeniable sign from her late father.

name: Paranormal Caught on Camera
overview: Some of the most amazing, eye-opening and downright scary paranormal videos from around the world are featured as a panel of experts break down the footage and analyze what exactly the eyewitnesses captured.

episodes.name: The Seedy Texas Motel Poltergeist and More
episodes.overview: A traveling businessman encounters poltergeist activity in his Texas motel room; a UFO is spotted over one of the holiest sites on Earth; a Sasquatch is spotted by two hikers in British Columbia.

episodes.name: The World's Most Haunted School and More
episodes.overview: Poltergeist activity is caught on an Irish school's security camera; two Russians encounter what may be a Sasquatch while driving in Siberia; a UFO is spotted flying over Australia in broad daylight.

episodes.name: The Montauk Monster
episodes.overview: A famous monster washes up on a New York beach; parents catch ghosts haunting nurseries on baby monitors; a UFO saves a Russian town.

episodes.name: Gettysburg Ghosts and More
episodes.overview: A ghost appears on the Gettysburg battlefield; a sea monster surfaces in Ireland; fleets of UFOs are spotted over the skies of Philadelphia and The Hague.

episodes.name: Haunted Antique Store and More
episodes.overview: A poltergeist haunts an English antique store; a man and his son encounter bigfoot in Washington; a strange UFO is spotted over Inner Mongolia.

episodes.name: Infamous Oregon Bigfoot Footage and More
episodes.overview: An Oregon man captures some of the best Bigfoot footage ever, crazy UFOs cluster over a Texas town and a Wales resident deals with a poltergeist roommate.

episodes.name: A UFO Spotted Over the Pentagon and More
episodes.overview: A pyramid-shaped UFO is spotted over the Pentagon, a father and his children are spooked by a ghost on a playground in Rhode Island and a security camera captures strange creatures stalking a California neighborhood.

episodes.name: Ghostly Regulars at Haunted Pubs and More
episodes.overview: Ghostly patrons haunt pubs throughout the United Kingdom, a shadow creature stalks a police officer on an empty plane in Mexico City and a sea monster is spotted by multiple witnesses on the Thames.

episodes.name: Encounter at an Abandoned Asylum and More
episodes.overview: A paranormal investigator is attacked by an entity in an abandoned asylum in Connecticut, a driver witnesses a strange UFO over a hotel in North Carolina and an Oregon marijuana dispensary is haunted by ghosts of the past.

episodes.name: A Highly Haunted Hotel in Arkansas and More
episodes.overview: A couple learns they're sharing their hotel room with a ghostly guest in Arkansas, a strange formation floats over a Philadelphia neighborhood and a monstrous creature washes up on the beach in the Philippines.

episodes.name: Florida Sea Monster Attack and More
episodes.overview: A couple encounters a sea monster while boating off the Florida coast; a man’s house becomes haunted after he opens a cursed box; a god-like figure walks across clouds in the sky in Alabama.

episodes.name: Utah Bigfoot Hunt and More
episodes.overview: Friends in Utah track down a Bigfoot spotted in the mountains; a total skeptic is attacked by a spirit at a haunted fort in England; ghostly passengers appear in a Hong Kong airport.

episodes.name: Dire Wolf Attack, Dog vs. Ghost, Gollum-Like Cryptid and More
episodes.overview: A home security camera captures a dog’s scary encounter with a ghost, a strange creature is spotted deep within a cave in the Alps and UFOs are witnessed during the daytime by people all over the globe.

episodes.name: Pennsylvania Shadow Person and More
episodes.overview: A Pennsylvania family is terrorized by a shadowy entity in their own home, a brazen Bigfoot appears in front of a large group of shocked witnesses in Oregon and two UFOs put on a show in the skies above Bath, England.

episodes.name: Delaware Ghost Bridge and More
episodes.overview: A group of friends test a local legend of a haunted bridge, a UFO is spotted from a plane window over California and a horrifying creature from the darkest corners of the internet is found in Oregon.

episodes.name: Demonic Doll and More
episodes.overview: A Pennsylvania family is terrorized by a haunted doll, two friends witness a fleet of UFOs in the night sky and a man encounters the infamous Yowie in the Australian outback.

episodes.name: Modern- Day Cyclops and More
episodes.overview: Experts are baffled by recent sightings of one-eyed creatures, a team of graveyard investigators confront the undead and demonic dolls run amok in a museum of haunted artifacts.

episodes.name: A Basket Full of Ghosts and More
episodes.overview: A haunted basket mystifies a mother and daughter, a mythical creature is spotted in Wales and two intrepid investigators come face-to-face with Slenderman.

episodes.name: Pushy Poltergeists and More
episodes.overview: A hike turns terrifying when a father and son are stalked by a mysterious creature, bone-chilling shrieks strike fear into residents of a Colombian town and US Navy pilots are stumped when their radar locks in on unidentified aircraft.

episodes.name: Arkansas Bigfoot Stalks a Father and Son and More
episodes.overview: A hike turns terrifying when a father and son are stalked by a mysterious creature, bone-chilling shrieks strike fear into residents of a Colombian town and US Navy pilots are stumped when their radar locks in on unidentified aircraft.

episodes.name: A Texas Ghost Attack Draws Blood and More
episodes.overview: Blood is drawn when a paranormal investigator explores an abandoned hospital in Texas, a baby's innocent play beckons a powerful entity and a snake hunter gets more than he bargained for when he spots a snake-like object in the sky.

episodes.name: Insanely Haunted Hospital in Michigan and More
episodes.overview: Paranormal investigators capture some truly terrifying footage in a haunted asylum, a father and son spot the mother of all UFOs, a poltergeist wreaks havoc in a vape shop and a legendary cryptid stalks a group of children.

episodes.name: A Colossal Lake Creature in Chile and More
episodes.overview: A lake monster stalks a group of swimmers, a security guard confronts a terrifying shadow person in an empty stadium, a college student is tormented by a ghostly roommate and a Russian man goes on the hunt for a Yeti.

episodes.name: Uninvited English House Ghoul and More
episodes.overview: A paranormal presence follows an investigator home, a UFO plays chicken with a freighter, a fearless family captures compelling evidence of Bigfoot and the ghost of a small child runs through a Savannah cemetery.

episodes.name: A Shadow Creature in Maine and More
episodes.overview: A man encounters a terrifying shadow creature in his bedroom, an unidentified light is spotted above Fairbanks, Alaska, and a Detroit brewery is visited by an angelic entity.

episodes.name: Jinn on the Prowl and More
episodes.overview: A ghost hunter is pushed to the brink by a demonic jinn, a shadow person invades a home in the UK and a creepy doll haunts a suburban basement.

episodes.name: Beware the Doll at the Haunted Inn and More
episodes.overview: A doll comes to life at a notoriously haunted hotel, a UFO is spotted flying suspiciously close to a volcano, a man gains a ghostly bedmate and locals are stumped by strange lights in the Ozarks.

episodes.name: The Ghost of Al Capone and More
episodes.overview: Ghost hunters make contact with an infamous gangster, a flying witch terrifies onlookers, a poltergeist torments a college student and something is alive in the sewers.

episodes.name: A Sasquatch Spotted in Siberia and More
episodes.overview: Three boys spot a Sasquatch-like creature in Siberia, a couple captures ghostly soldiers on camera in Gettysburg and a teenager is terrified by a freakish formation in the sky.

episodes.name: Roadside Ghost Bride and More
episodes.overview: A ghostly woman in white strolls along a dark highway, an underwater entity stalks a boat in a canal and a gas station employee makes contact with a mysterious humanoid.

episodes.name: Ghost Dogs and More
episodes.overview: Beloved pets visit their owners from beyond the grave, a poltergeist moves chairs in a sports bar and a couple is interrupted by an uninvited dinner ghost.

episodes.name: A Haunted Bar and More
episodes.overview: A destructive spirit wreaks havoc on a bar, three boys encounter a Sasquatch-like creature in the woods and dozes of worm-shaped UFOs appear over South America.

episodes.name: A Frightening Ghost Attack and More
episodes.overview: A shadowy entity attacks a ghost hunter, a mechanic is visited by an angel and a family hears the bloodcurdling howls of a Bigfoot.

episodes.name: An Arsonist Ghost and More
episodes.overview: Two brothers tangle with a ghost that likes to set fires, a mother ship unleashes an army of UFOs and a man faces terrifying consequences when he teases an interdimensional being.

episodes.name: A Ventriloquist Dummy Comes to Life and More
episodes.overview: A antique ventriloquist dummy is taken over by an otherworldly entity, a haunted hotel gives a ghost hunter the fright of his life, a woman's apartment is invaded by a ferocious shadow creature and more.

episodes.name: Ghostly Abandoned Prisons and More
episodes.overview: A man explores a haunted prison with terrifying results, a jellyfish-like object levitates in the bright daylight of a Las Vegas summer day and a biker's backwoods jaunt is interrupted by a mysterious creature.

episodes.name: A Fire Smokes Out a Cryptid in Oklahoma and More
episodes.overview: A brush fire spooks a Sasquatch in Oklahoma, spirits torment a security guard at Savannah cemetery, a fleet of UFOs stun onlookers in Poland and more.

episodes.name: Chased by a Bigfoot and More
episodes.overview: A Sasquatch chases a group of young Russians to their car, a mother's worst fears are confirmed when security cameras capture two entities in her new home, mysterious sounds trumpet from the skies and more.

episodes.name: A Haunted Farmhouse in Maine and More
episodes.overview: A ghost hunter communicates with trapped spirits inside a 19th-century farmhouse, hundreds of UFOs are spotted off the coast of Florida, a motorcyclist in India has a close call with creepy entity and more.

episodes.name: Mysterious Mesa Lights and More
episodes.overview: A couple spies multiple UFOs in the skies above Arizona, a poltergeist stalks a Florida family, a cryptid hunter gets up close and personal with a Bigfoot in North Carolina and more.

episodes.name: Ghost Hunt in a Haunted Prison and More
episodes.overview: A paranormal team gets the shock of their lives while investigating an abandoned Illinois prison, a UFO gets dangerously close to two commercial jets and a ghostly local legend shows itself in England.

episodes.name: Reptilian Creature in Thailand and More
episodes.overview: A man searches for answers after he spots a reptilian creature in Thailand, a baby has a terrifying encounter with a ghost and a war-torn ship yields a haunting message.

episodes.name: Flying Cryptid Over Chicago And More
episodes.overview: A man stands in awe as he watches mysterious creatures fly over Chicago. A group of teens pay the price when they travel down a notoriously haunted road in New Jersey. Ghost hunters explore an abandoned church infected with a powerful demonic presence.

episodes.name: Hawaiian UFOs and More
episodes.overview: A man captures three glowing UFOs hovering over government property in Hawaii. Paranormal investigators contact the spirit of a little boy in a haunted cave. Faithful followers watch a crucifix shake on its own in India.

episodes.name: A Haunted Gift and More
episodes.overview: A Delaware family's home is terrorized by an evil spirit, playgrounds around the world open up their gates to more than just the living and a colossal creature is spotted near the shore of an Irish lake.

episodes.name: Alaskan Sea Serpent and More
episodes.overview: A tourist captures startling footage of a giant sea serpent in Alaska, an unsuspecting ghost hunter is assaulted by a vengeful spirit and a bipedal beast roams the hills alongside a California highway.

episodes.name: Haunted By A Rock Legend And More
episodes.overview: Paranormal investigators communicate with a dearly departed rock legend. A ghostly canine joins its former owner for a nighttime stroll. A government camera captures high-quality evidence of Bigfoot.

episodes.name: Las Vegas Ufos And More
episodes.overview: A Florida man encounters an elusive -- and stinky -- Sasquatch. Ghost hunters attempt to contact the spirit of a murder victim in Tennessee. A Las Vegas resident captures of incredible footage of UFOs soaring in the skies.

episodes.name: Pennhurst Asylum and More
episodes.overview: Ghost hunters encounter a shadow person in an abandoned Pennsylvania asylum. An Iowa couple accidentally brings home a haunted statue. A mom in Kentucky discovers a real-life boogeyman hiding n her daughter's closet.

episodes.name: An Ogopogo Sighting and More
episodes.overview: A father and son record unprecedented evidence of a Canadian lake monster. A doorbell security camera captures fiery orbs falling from the skies above California. An investigative team is accosted by the spirits of a murdered family in Nevada.

episodes.name: Haunted Dam and More
episodes.overview: Two men stumble upon the apparition of a ghostly bride in a haunted church. Shocking drone footage captures the elusive Ohio Grassman. A ferry sits in the cross hairs of battling UFOs along the banks of North Carolina.

episodes.name: Seance Possession and More
episodes.overview: A man is possessed by an evil entity during a seance in York, England. An Oregon woman is stunned by a glowing UFO hovering above her new home. A ghost hunter is violently attacked by a poltergeist in an abandoned nursing home with a horrific past.

episodes.name: Stonehenge UFOs and More
episodes.overview: Mysterious lights hover in the skies above Stonehenge on the eve of the summer solstice. A woman witnesses a soul leaving a dead deer's body. A Florida man finds grisly proof of a violent extraterrestrial attack.

episodes.name: New York Ufo And More
episodes.overview: A military veteran spies an otherworldly aircraft flying in the skies above New York. Screaming ghosts haunt the halls of an abandoned home in Belgium. A New Jersey couple discovers their dog has a paranormal playmate.

episodes.name: Ghost Kitty and More
episodes.overview: A Florida man records a werewolf speeding across his backyard. A feline friend returns from the grave to visit its owner -- and take a nap? Two Chinese explorers get a horrifying glimpse into a haunted mirror.

episodes.name: Haunted Teddy Bear and More
episodes.overview: A tenacious teddy bear terrorizes twins in Texas. A man is tormented by a vengeful spirit in an abandoned garage. A woman fears an alien invasion outside her window in California.

episodes.name: Teen Vampire and More
episodes.overview: A young man stuns his friends with a vampiric transformation. A man witnesses a possible alien invasion in California. A popular app leads a Canadian college student to a haunted location.

episodes.name: A Wave From the Grave and More
episodes.overview: A murderous spirit toys with a paranormal investigator trapped in a closet. A shadow figure makes itself at home in Chile. A dead man waves at his family members through his coffin window.

episodes.name: High School Shadow Figure And More
episodes.overview: A shadowy entity roams the halls of an abandoned South Dakota high school. An evening stroll with the family pooch turns into an extraterrestrial encounter. Blood-curdling screams rain from the skies during a Texas thunderstorm.

episodes.name: Supermarket Ghost and More
episodes.overview: A ghostly prankster torments the staff at a Scottish grocery store. A UFO flies across an airport runway in Puerto Rico. A legendary child-snatching cryptid is spotted in Bolivia.

episodes.name: A Jellyfish in the Sky and More
episodes.overview: A Texas man spots a dazzling light anomaly among the stars while camping. A glowing blob of energy emerges from a streetlight in Arkansas. Paranormal investigators communicate with the dead in a notoriously haunted villa in Kansas.

episodes.name: OMG Caught On Camera
episodes.overview: Two friends emerge unharmed after a car plows into a restaurant. Skydivers miraculously survive after their planes collide. A Utah man stares death in the face as he's stalked by an angry cougar. All that and more will have you screaming "OMG!"

episodes.name: Banff Bigfoot and More
episodes.overview: An elk hunter witnesses two Bigfoots stalking their prey in Canada. A Maine man crosses paths with a terrifying shadow figure while driving down a dark road late at night. An explosive argument fuels powerful poltergeist activity in Malaysia.

episodes.name: Cajun Skunk Ape and More
episodes.overview: A stinky Sasquatch pays a visit, a UFO flies near Fort Knox, and more.

episodes.name: Arizona Dorm Room Ghost and More
episodes.overview: A college student gets a ghostly roommate in Arizona. A paranormal investigator is antagonized by an ancient entity in Saudi Arabia. A Florida mother and her daughter are profoundly moved by a UFO sighting.

episodes.name: Brazilian Werewolf and More
episodes.overview: A shadow figure makes itself at home in a North Carolina couple's bathroom. A werewolf stalks a man in his own backyard in Brazil. A ghostly customer trashes an adult store in Taiwan.

episodes.name: Mermaid in Nashville and More
episodes.overview: A mermaid goes for a dip in Tennessee, a spirit takes control, and more.

episodes.name: Canadian Lake Monster and More
episodes.overview: A lake monster surfaces, a knife-wielding poltergeist attacks, and more.

episodes.name: Kentucky Poltergeist and more
episodes.overview: Glasses thrown at bartender and beer hoses lifted by invisible force. In Holland, a man's apartment is haunted. Strange lights above the earth caught by NASA. A haunting in Jordan and more.

episodes.name: Haunted Goldfield and More
episodes.overview: Ghostly guests attack a woman, a lake monster surfaces in Sweden, and more.

episodes.name: Rainbow Portal and More
episodes.overview: A colorful anomaly dazzles onlookers, orbs parade through a jail, and more.

episodes.name: Bronx UFO and More
episodes.overview: UFOs invade the Bronx, a museum houses a mummy, and more.

episodes.name: Dog vs. Poltergeist and More
episodes.overview: A woman plays catch with a ghost, a dog senses something spooky, and more.

episodes.name: Greek Ghost and More
episodes.overview: A village is riddled with spirits, a toddler tussles with a ghost and more.

episodes.name: Bio UFO and More
episodes.overview: An unusual UFO flies over SoCal, a man is saved by an angel, and more.

episodes.name: Long Island Ghosts and More
episodes.overview: A man leaves his childhood ghosts behind, a woman conjures a UFO, and more.

episodes.name: Utah Apparition and More
episodes.overview: A couple gets a ghostly visitor, a man communicates with the dead and more.

episodes.name: Minnesota UFOs and More
episodes.overview: A man seeks answers about UFOs, and a woman finds out she's not alone.

episodes.name: Skinwalker Stalker and More
episodes.overview: A cowboy avoids a scheming skinwalker, and UFOs loom large over San Diego.

episodes.name: Georgia Ghost and More
episodes.overview: Triplets are caught speaking to an unseen entity, and a man tracks Bigfoot.

episodes.name: Shadow Figure 911 and More
episodes.overview: A shadow person lurks in a 911 call center, and fairies frolic in a garden.

episodes.name: Haunted Pinata and More
episodes.overview: A shop owner in Mexico loses customers to a haunted piñata; a man in Russia is driven out of an abandoned house by an angry poltergeist; a woman is potentially a UFO magnet.

episodes.name: Las Vegas Demon and More
episodes.overview: A grandmother catches a demon on a baby monitor; a man records footage of glistening rainbow UFO in California; mind-bending phenomena around the globe reveals a glitch in the matrix.

episodes.name: Montana Nightcrawler and More
episodes.overview: A man in Montana wonders what happened to a dead deer on his property until he sees the terrifying creature that may be responsible; a military airbase in Germany is visited by a UFO.

episodes.name: Kentucky Spirit and More
episodes.overview: A spirit wanders around a distillery, and a witch laughs in the dark.

episodes.name: WV Slenderman and More
episodes.overview: A new home is plagued by a ghost, and the Slenderman visits West Virginia.

episodes.name: Witch on a Broomstick and More
episodes.overview: Two apparitions crash a livestream from a centuries-old English graveyard. A witch soars through the sky above a mountain in Chile. A mischievous black cat casts a fiery spell in Egypt.

episodes.name: Death Valley UFO and More
episodes.overview: Two friends are chased out of California's Death Valley by a UFO. A ghostly hand reaches out to a woman in Wales. A webcam in the Scottish Highlands captures incredible evidence of the Loch Ness Monster.

episodes.name: Moose Walks on Water and More
episodes.overview: A shadowy spirit visits the Titanic, and a spectral moose stuns in Alaska.

episodes.name: Florida Dinosaur and More
episodes.overview: A ghostly figure watches urban explorers from the shadows in England. A velociraptor skitters across a yard in Florida. A fleet of low-flying UFOs make contact with two men in Ohio.

episodes.name: An Angel Appears in Michigan and More
episodes.overview: A horrifying humanoid visits an abandoned amusement park in Indonesia. Mysterious floating lights emanate from a forest in California. An angel hovers over a firefighter's truck in Michigan.

episodes.name: East River Dog Rescue and More
episodes.overview: A skydiver is knocked unconscious 10,000 feet in the air above Texas. A man dives into New York's East River to save a drowning dog. A kayaker is attacked by an alligator in North Carolina. Police officers rush to save a woman trapped in a sinking van.

episodes.name: Rabid Bobcat Attack in North Carolina and More
episodes.overview: A North Carolina man fights off a rabid bobcat in his front yard. An experienced caver finds himself trapped in rising waters. A hang glider holds on for dear life hundreds of feet above Switzerland. Two dogs are rescued from a frigid reservoir.

episodes.name: Mississippi Car Explosion and More
episodes.overview: A truck driver rushes headlong into danger when a car bursts into flames on the road in Mississippi. A Florida man wrestles an alligator to save his puppy. Parents all over the world dive into action to save their children from certain death.

episodes.name: Black-Eyed Child Apparition in Reno and More
episodes.overview: A toddler in Nevada dances with a sinister child-like apparition; a Minnesota family catches Bigfoot in their backyard; a tree in the Philippines spouts holy water from a mysterious source.

episodes.name: Philadelphia UFOs and More
episodes.overview: A Colorado man is tormented by a voodoo curse; baffling bright lights in the sky stun onlookers in Philadelphia; in Mexico, a child's favorite play area is invaded by the notorious duende.

episodes.name: GoPro Captures Bigfoot in Ontario and More
episodes.overview: A couple catch a glimpse of Bigfoot, thanks to a GoPro camera on their bumper; a shadow figure stalks investigators in an abandoned farmhouse in Tennessee; a man in Canada captures what could be the cries of a cryptid giving birth.

episodes.name: Haunted Texas Hotel and More
episodes.overview: A dog leads her owner to an apparition in England; a Texas family lives in a historic hotel with ghostly guests; a hiker stumbles across a cryptid's lair deep in the Canadian woods.

episodes.name: Alabama Glitch in the Matrix and More
episodes.overview: A UFO shoots across the sky in the Pocono Mountains; Bigfoot hides from a crowd in Tennessee's Great Smoky Mountains; a suspended soap bubble may be evidence of a glitch in the matrix.

episodes.name: Mysterious Mountainside Lights in North Carolina and More
episodes.overview: Mysterious orbs light up a mountainside in North Carolina. A man in Sweden communicates with a graveyard ghost. A humanoid creature perches atop a roof in Brazil.

episodes.name: Haunted Connecticut Thrift Store and More
episodes.overview: A ghost surprises shoppers at a thrift store in Connecticut. A grotesque creature corners a man in an abandoned farmhouse in England. UFOs join in on New Year's Eve festivities in cities all over the world.

episodes.name: Shadow Figure in a New Jersey Backyard and More
episodes.overview: A rake stalks a pack of deer in a Minnesota suburb. Phantom gunshots haunt the site of a horrific tragedy in North Carolina. An eerie shadow figure pops in and out of existence.

episodes.name: Virginia Civil War Ghost and More
episodes.overview: A researcher finds the remains of a legendary dragon deep in the Mediterranean Sea. A beloved factory worker clocks into her shift years after her death in Japan. A Civil War spirit strolls along a battlefield.

episodes.name: Will-o-Wisps at an Arizona Campground and More
episodes.overview: A team of researchers capture compelling evidence of the Yowie in Australia. An ethereal mist engulfs a roomful of ghost hunters in England. A camper is surrounded by glowing orbs deep in the Arizona forest.

episodes.name: Gnome Visits a Phoenix Garden and More
episodes.overview: A real-life gnome frolics in an Arizona garden. A coffin opens by itself in an English hostel. Leaked footage shows a UFO hovering near a bomb testing site in Nevada.

episodes.name: The Great Gatsby Ghost and More
episodes.overview: A grieving woman uses her TV to communicate with her deceased boyfriend. Tentacled creatures swim through the skies above Colorado. A heartbroken ghost gazes forlornly from the window of an abandoned home.

episodes.name: The Haunted Hill House in Texas and More
episodes.overview: A spirit box session at an abandoned murder mansion goes awry. UFOs gather in a geometric formation in New Hampshire. A poltergeist plays the accordion in Russia.

episodes.name: Light Beings Hover Over Colorado and More
episodes.overview: A ghost toys with a dog in Arizona. A disembodied hand haunts an abandoned Mexican prison. Night vision binoculars capture spectacular footage of UFOs hiding in plain sight.

episodes.name: Haunted Tennessee Crypt and More
episodes.overview: Experts analyze footage from paranormal videos; specialists provide insights, while eyewitnesses give firsthand accounts of strange phenomena.

episodes.name: Grim Reaper in Massachusetts and More
episodes.overview: Experts analyze footage from paranormal videos; specialists provide insights, while eyewitnesses give firsthand accounts of strange phenomena.

episodes.name: Utah Sasquatch and More
episodes.overview: Experts analyze footage from paranormal videos; specialists provide insights, while eyewitnesses give firsthand accounts of strange phenomena.

episodes.name: Santa Fe UFO and More
episodes.overview: A man leaving work is startled by a gigantic UFO. A convenience store in Malaysia is visited by the dangerous and voluptuous Hantu Tetek. An abandoned temple in Ohio is haunted by a horde of shadow people.

episodes.name: Ghostly Figure Haunts an Indiana Museum and More
episodes.overview: A drumming session in New York is interrupted by a chilling apparition. A ghostly guest visits an Indiana museum after hours. A giant portal opens in the sky above Oregon.

episodes.name: Colorado Gugwe and More
episodes.overview: A UFO crashes a family gathering in Louisiana. In the ruins of Chernobyl, a mutated being terrifies hikers camping out for the night. A woman encounters Bigfoot's angrier, more canine-like cousin.

episodes.name: Shadow Figure Haunts Man in Colorado And More
episodes.overview: A shadow figure torments a cursed man in Colorado. Dark spirits attack paranormal investigators at an Italian castle. A terrifying creature lurks in a backyard in England.

episodes.name: Haunted Florida Bed and Breakfast and More
episodes.overview: A cruise ship captain spots UFOs off the coast of the Bahamas. A friendly spirit puts on a show for paranormal investigators at a haunted bed and breakfast. A shadow figure stalks a woman through a Transylvania forest.

episodes.name: Couple Spots UFO Over Military Base in California And More
episodes.overview: A shadow figure sneaks around an abandoned Seattle restaurant. A roadside apparition chases after two motorcyclists in India. A California couple is baffled by a mysterious immobile object in the sky.

episodes.name: Virginia UFO and More
episodes.overview: An Ohio man is horrified when his wife's doll collection comes to life. A UFO looms over a couple's house in Virginia. A toddler's ghostly playmate torments a family in Texas.

episodes.name: The Unexplained Crossett Lights In Arkansas And More
episodes.overview: A ghost hunter is tormented by spirits at an abandoned rec center in Florida. A bizarre humanoid creature soars over Scotland. The unexplained Crossett lights mesmerize two friends on a remote dirt road in Arkansas.

episodes.name: Tennessee Sasquatch and More
episodes.overview: Hundreds of twinkling UFOs crash Thanksgiving in Pennsylvania. A man in Wales has been living with a poltergeist for more than a decade. Sasquatch emerges from the woods in Tennessee.

episodes.name: Glitch in Reality, Long Island Bigfoot and More
episodes.overview: Glitches in the matrix stun spectators in Paris, LA and Argentina. A spirit attempts to halt construction on a family’s home in the Philippines. A Bigfoot enthusiast captures something shocking in Long Island.

episodes.name: Ghost Photobombs Kids and More
episodes.overview: A mother's blood runs cold when a ghostly child photobombs a family picture in England. A shape-shifting alien sends a family running for cover in Mexico. A social media influencer finds a monster under her bed.

episodes.name: Haunted Doll Bites Child and More
episodes.overview: A possessed doll latches onto a little girl in Canada. Extraterrestrial visitors stun a rugby team in Lebanon. Siblings cross paths with a terrifying headless apparition in India.

episodes.name: Shadow Figure Intruder and More
episodes.overview: A shadow figure latches onto a first responder in Tennessee. A ghostly chef cooks up trouble at a Connecticut restaurant. A drone enthusiast in Alabama is shocked when he sees a parade of UFOs streaming across the sky.

episodes.name: Tormented Souls Trapped in Italy and More
episodes.overview: A school in the Philippines houses spirits from an adjacent cemetery. Shadow figures and phantom flames lurk within an abandoned brick factory in Italy. A group of friends witness a massive UFO taking off in Argentina.

episodes.name: Mischievous Duende in Argentina and More
episodes.overview: Paranormal investigators capture a shadow figure in a haunted Nevada prison. A hidebehind in Oregon gives a girl and her grandma a serious fright. A tiny elfin creature makes a toddler uneasy in Argentina.

episodes.name: Ghost Girl in Chicago Bar and More
episodes.overview: A dark entity shows itself to investigators inside one of America's most haunted homes. The ghost of a young girl materializes in an Illinois bar. A father and son in California film a UFO that appears to be alive.

episodes.name: Inside the Screaming House and More
episodes.overview: UK investigators are confronted by a dark presence in an abandoned home. Is Bigfoot stalking two brothers in Rochester, NY? A smoke break in San Juan turns into a double UFO sighting.

episodes.name: Green Creature in Aruba Cave and More
episodes.overview: A party store in Mexico is plagued by a malicious entity. A treasure hunt is interrupted by Bigfoot in New Mexico. A mysterious green creature lurks inside a cave in Aruba.

episodes.name: The Departed DJ and More
episodes.overview: A creature that tormented an Australian man’s childhood is back for more. A DJ in North Carolina is still spinning sets from beyond the grave. A UFO in Islamabad remains immobile for hours.

episodes.name: Little Girl vs. Ghost and More
episodes.overview: A Michigan toddler plays a spirited game of tug of war with a ghost; a paranormal enthusiast in England captures a shadow figure lurking at the foot of his bed; a massive lake monster surfaces in China.

episodes.name: The Darkness Over Houston and More
episodes.overview: An unknown entity continues to torment a New Jersey family. A strange specter spies on a paranormal investigator at an abandoned train station in Sweden. A woman captures a mysterious dark mass hovering in the skies above Houston.

episodes.name: Mysterious Lights in Moab and More
episodes.overview: A Bigfoot enthusiast captures evidence of the legendary cryptid's elusive cousin -- the Ohio Grassman. Mysterious glowing orbs manifest in the Utah desert. A haunted doll torments a family in Canada.

episodes.name: Shape-Shifting Alien, Monster Under the Bed and More
episodes.overview: A shape-shifting alien sends a family running for cover; an internet star finds a monster under her bed; an urban explorer runs head-on into an apparition; a spirit attempts to halt construction on a home.

episodes.name: Ghostly Chef, Aliens at Rugby and More
episodes.overview: A phantom chef cooks up trouble at a restaurant. Extraterrestrial visitors stun a rugby team. A possessed doll latches onto a little girl. A parade of UFOs stream across the sky.

episodes.name: UFO Takes Off in Argentina, School Spirit and More
episodes.overview: A group of friends encounter an incredible UFO while hiking in the woods. A school security guard comes comes face-to-face with a terrifying entity. A hidebehind gives a girl and her grandma a serious fright. A tiny elfin creature makes a toddler uneasy.

episodes.name: Stalked by Bigfoot, Living UFO and More
episodes.overview: Two men are stalked by an unseen creature in the woods. A UFO comes alive. An ancient entity toys with a young explorer. A couple moves in with a poltergeist.

episodes.name: Plagued Party Store, Childhood Creature Returns and More
episodes.overview: A malicious entity wreaks havoc in a party store. A man reckons with a terrifying haunting from his childhood. A treasure hunt is interrupted by Bigfoot. A departed DJ spins a set from beyond the grave.

episodes.name: Massive Lake Monster, Strange Spectator in Sweden and More
episodes.overview: An unidentified monster surfaces in a peaceful lake. A strange specter spies on a paranormal investigator. A toddler plays a spirited game of tug of war. Haunted artifacts stir up trouble at a museum.

episodes.name: Demonic Doll Attack in West Virginia and More
episodes.overview: Two brothers attempt to communicate with a doll with a demonic disposition. A backwoods biker encounters grisly evidence of skinwalker activity. UFOs crash an Independence Day celebration.

episodes.name: Bigfoot Spotted in the Rocky Mountains and More
episodes.overview: Train passengers spot Bigfoot in broad daylight. A family gets more than a theme park thrill when a ghost hitches a ride on a roller coaster. A groundskeeper contends with a pesky poltergeist in a cemetery.

episodes.name: Wendigo in Kentucky and More
episodes.overview: A family captures footage of an emaciated cryptid on their home security camera; haunted objects compete for museum guests' attention; strange lights in the sky bring commuters to a halt.

episodes.name: Skinwalker in Arizona and More
episodes.overview: Hunters spot a skinwalker emerging from the woods; a man spots thousands of UFOs from his backyard; an apparition manifests on a haunted highway.

episodes.name: Dogman Stalks Zoo Animals in Amarillo and More
episodes.overview: A family spots Bigfoot in their own backyard; UFOs speed by in broad daylight; a cryptid peruses a zoo in search of its next meal.

episodes.name: Poltergeist Stalks Family in Houston and More
episodes.overview: A phantom monk roams around a 13th-century church. A family moves and takes their poltergeist with them. Three UFOs fall in formation.

episodes.name: Mermaid off the Coast of Nantucket and More
episodes.overview: A mermaid serenades a commercial fisherman. A shadow figure scuffles with a small dog. A ghost blows out birthday candles.

episodes.name: Resurrected Woman in Ecuador and More
episodes.overview: Shadow figures roam the halls of an abandoned manor. A couple and their friend get up close and personal with a local lake monster. A woman declared dead comes back to life at her own funeral.

episodes.name: Grim Reaper in the Irish Forest and More
episodes.overview: A mysterious entity is spotted in the Irish countryside. A seance goes violently wrong. A UFO pays an overnight visit to the city that never sleeps.

episodes.name: Dog’s Spirit in California and More
episodes.overview: Children across North American interact with ghosts that their parents can't see. A woman gets one last goodbye from her faithful furry friend. Citizens in China fear the worst as hundreds of orbs swarm in the moonlight.

episodes.name: Gold Rush Ghost House in Nevada and More
episodes.overview: A shadowy figure spies on a paranormal investigator near an abandoned mining tunnel. A man and his son stumble upon a very talkative Bigfoot. A cube-shaped UFO surveils the Las Vegas strip.

episodes.name: Volcano Portal in Mexico and More
episodes.overview: A witch taunts paranormal investigators in a haunted graveyard. A woman's late husband checks in on their sleeping baby. An erupting volcano spews lava ... and paranormal activity.

episodes.name: Ghosts in a Cabinet in Pennsylvania and More
episodes.overview: A couple has a cabinet in their home that holds knickknacks, antique dolls and a whole lot of ghosts. A UFO eclipses an eclipse. A phantom shopper strolls through a mall.

episodes.name: Lighthouse for Lost Souls in England and More
episodes.overview: Ghosts flock to a quaint coastal farmhouse. A pastor's sermon is interrupted by the Devil himself. A woman and her dogs have multiple terrifying encounters with Bigfoot

episodes.name: Goblin Road Crossing in Mexico and More
episodes.overview: Spirits haunt the basement of an abandoned winery. Shadow figures catch a flick at a decades-old movie theater. A legendary creature is caught crossing the road.

episodes.name: Feline Phantom in Minnesota and More
episodes.overview: A baby monitor picks up a ghostly figure walking next to a child's bed. A speeding UFO infiltrates an air show. A young woman ushers in the new year with an undeniable sign from her late father.
